en.hotprice_title_bottom: New premium tea to start this year off right.
en.hotprice_description:
A premium pressed Pu-erh with a rich yet smooth flavor.
Reveals warm woody and earthy notes,
without harsh bitterness, and a long, balanced aftertaste.
Ideal for unhurried tea sessions and classic Pu-erh lovers.
Type: pressed Pu-erh
Weight: 400 g
Price: 40 EUR

en.teapot1_details_description:
A practical and convenient 1-liter teapot,
perfect for everyday tea drinking at home or with company.
Ensures even brewing and is easy to use.
Suitable for various types of tea ‚Äî from light white teas to rich Pu-erh.
Its clean design fits well into any interior.
Volume: 1 L
en.teapot2_details_description:
A stylish and practical Magnetic Teapot Classic
that allows you to easily control the brewing process.
The magnetic mechanism ensures smooth and even tea extraction with minimal effort.
Perfect for high-quality loose-leaf tea,
combining convenience with an elegant tea experience.
Type: magnetic teapot
en.teapot3_details_description:
An elegant Magnetic Teapot ‚ÄúWith a Bird‚Äù that combines functionality with visual appeal.
The magnetic mechanism allows easy control of the brewing process,
while the decorative bird detail adds a unique charm to your tea ritual.
Perfect for loose-leaf tea and a beautiful accent for any tea table.
Type: magnetic teapot
en.teawares1_details_description:
A practical tool for carefully separating pressed Pu-erh tea.
Allows you to loosen the tea leaves gently without damaging their structure,
preserving the tea‚Äôs quality and flavor.
An essential accessory for pressed tea lovers.
Type: Pu-erh tool
en.teawares2_details_description:
An unusual tea cup that spins on a wooden base.
A striking detail that turns an ordinary tea break into a small and memorable ritual.
Adds a unique atmosphere and draws attention with its original design.
en.tables2_details_description:
A spacious and aesthetic tea table designed for comfortable tea sessions at home.
Perfect for those who enjoy tea without rush and appreciate space and comfort.
Helps keep the tea area clean and organized while creating a cozy atmosphere.
Size: 54 √ó 33 √ó 5 cm
en.tea1_details_description:
Very beneficial for vision
Positively affects the nervous system and helps with insomnia
Has a pleasant aroma
Pairs well with lemon, honey, lavender, rose and also with mint‚úÖ
en.tea2_details_description:
An elite white tea with a soft,
clean taste and delicate aroma.
The infusion is light and clear,
with subtle floral notes and a smooth aftertaste.
Perfect for calm morning or daytime tea sessions.
Type: white tea
Weight: 100 g
en.tea3_details_description:
A premium pressed Pu-erh with a rich yet smooth flavor.
Reveals warm woody and earthy notes,
without harsh bitterness, and a long, balanced aftertaste.
Ideal for unhurried tea sessions and classic Pu-erh lovers.
Type: pressed Pu-erh
Weight: 400 g
en.instruction1_details_description:
All types of Portioned Tea are brewed the same way.
Use 1 portion of tea per 200‚Äì250 ml of water.
Warm up your teapot or cup by rinsing it with hot water.
Portioned Tea is not afraid of boiling water, but it‚Äôs better to let it cool slightly ‚Äî about 95¬∞C or higher.
Place one portion of tea into a warm empty teapot or gaiwan and pour in hot water.
After 10‚Äì15 seconds, pour out the first infusion (don‚Äôt
drink it) ‚Äî this rinses the tea.
For the second brew, pour hot water again and steep for 30 seconds to 1
minute, then enjoy your tea. The longer you steep, the stronger
and richer the taste.
For the third and following infusions, steep for 30 seconds to 2 minutes.
You can rebrew the same portion up to 4‚Äì5 times throughout the day.
Enjoy your tea time! ‚òï
en.instruction2_details_title: How to properly brew ‚óèBlue Tea Anchan‚óè?
en.instruction2_details_description:
1 teaspoon (2‚Äì4 g) per 250‚Äì300 ml. You can brew it with boiling water.
Let it steep for about 2 minutes ‚Äî then your delicious and very healthy tea is ready to drink.
You can brew the same portion twice during the day.
Lemon or a spoon of honey goes perfectly with this tea.
Enjoy your tea time! ‚òï💙

V≈°etky druhy d√°vkovan√©ho ƒçaju sa pripravuj√∫ rovnak√Ωm sp√¥sobom.

Pri tre≈•om a nasleduj√∫cich n√°levoch l√∫hujte 30 sek√∫nd a≈æ 2 min√∫ty.
Rovnak√∫ porciu m√¥≈æete zalia≈• a≈æ 4‚Äì5 kr√°t poƒças d≈àa.
U≈æite si svoj ƒças pri ƒçaji! ‚òï

1 ƒçajov√° ly≈æiƒçka (2‚Äì4 g) na 250‚Äì300 ml. M√¥≈æete zalia≈• vriacou vodou.
